attributes.action: Regularly test health and care workers for Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To safeguard their own health, and that of their patients and prevent spread of the virus
attributes.background: For the duration of the Covid-19 pandemic all health and care workers with direct client exposure should be provided weekly testing to identify sufferers and carriers of the virus

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling for the Government make Covid-19 testing available for all healthcare professionals, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005
